chart.title: Agricultural output
chart.subtitle: Total agricultural output is the sum of crop and livestock products. It is measured in constant 2015 US$, which means it adjusts for inflation.
chart.citation: United States Department for Agriculture (USDA) Economic Research Service

output_quantity.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
output_quantity.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Agricultural output” [dataset]. United States Department for Agriculture (USDA) Economic Research Service [original data].
